metadata.title: CVE-2023-38324 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in OpenNDS before 10.1.2. It allows users to skipthe splash page sequence (and directly authenticate) when it is using thedefault FAS key and OpenNDS is configured as FAS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38324` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opennds - 10.2.0+dfsg-1
opennds-daemon - 10.2.0+dfsg-1
opennds-daemon-common - 10.2.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opennds package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.2.0+dfsg-1').
